g.title: CSS Masking: Basic shape inset() on SVG rectangle with percentag values
g.desc: A basic shape function inset() applied to an SVG rectangle. Percentage values are relative to a reference box. If not reference box was specified the objectBoundingBox is used. The inset used per side is specified by the first 10% argument. The second 10% specify the border radius. You should see a green square with rounded corners.
